# Quick intro to R

## For those who are from other languages, especially Python

1. The character `.` is NOT special. It doesn't mean packages or classes. It is just one of the characters that can be used as variable names.
2. R recommends to use `<-` to denote assigning values, although `=` is accepted. `a <- 1` and `a = 1` are essentially the same. It has some benefits
